amendment.description: Amendment increases the Federal government-wide goal for participation of small business concerns in procurement contracts from 23 percent to 30 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-137 to raise the government-wide small business procurement goal from 25 percent to 30 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bean amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 371 - 55 (Roll no. 321).
